CustomField.description: The total amount received for a "gathering" projection - auto-maintained as the sum of posted transactions in the given FY assigned to the given chart-of-accounts that don't link to an opportunity with its own projection in this FY.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The total amount received for a "gathering" projection - auto-maintained as the sum of posted transactions in the given FY assigned to the given chart-of-accounts that don't link to an opportunity with its own projection in this FY.
CustomField.label: Total gathered
